metadata.dc:author: Pereza, C R
metadata.dc:description: In order to elaborate an attitude model of patients that come over to the School of Odontology of the Central University of Venezuela, asking for odontological treatment, from the subject's point of view about the general odontology health and his own odontology health, we have done this investigation work, where we interviewed 250 persons that came over to our service and each of them were assigned to the students, from there and on we do our suggestions and to be considered in order to assist this people.
metadata.dc:title: Perfil del paciente que solicita atención en la Facultad Odontología de la UCV.
[Profile of patients seeking care at the UCV Dental School].
